lyrics:
[00:00.00] Intro
[00:10.00] Verse 1
[00:12.00] Cigarette smoke in the neon glow
[00:16.00] Dancing shadows where the lost souls go
[00:20.00] Your leather jacket and that crooked smile
[00:24.00] Haven't seen you in a little while
[00:30.00] Pre-Chorus
[00:32.00] The city's calling but we're standing still
[00:36.00] Chasing dreams we never will fulfill
[00:42.00] Chorus
[00:44.00] We're just silhouettes in the midnight rain
[00:48.00] Running from the truth and the endless pain
[00:52.00] Electric hearts in a concrete maze
[00:56.00] Living for the night, sleeping through the days
[01:02.00] Verse 2
[01:04.00] Broken bottles on the avenue
[01:08.00] Graffiti walls telling stories true
[01:12.00] Your whispered words in the cold night air
[01:16.00] Pretending like we just don't care
[01:22.00] Pre-Chorus
[01:24.00] The city's calling but we're standing still
[01:28.00] Chasing dreams we never will fulfill
[01:34.00] Chorus
[01:36.00] We're just silhouettes in the midnight rain
[01:40.00] Running from the truth and the endless pain
[01:44.00] Electric hearts in a concrete maze
[01:48.00] Living for the night, sleeping through the days
[01:54.00] Bridge
[01:56.00] And when the morning comes we'll fade away
[02:00.00] Like yesterday's mistakes we can't replay
[02:04.00] The streetlights dim and the music dies
[02:08.00] But we'll be back beneath these starless skies
[02:14.00] Guitar Solo
[02:34.00] Verse 3
[02:36.00] Your reflection in the window pane
[02:40.00] Dancing slowly in the pouring rain
[02:44.00] We're just ghosts of who we used to be
[02:48.00] Lost in this electric reverie
[02:54.00] Final Chorus
[02:56.00] We're just silhouettes in the midnight rain
[03:00.00] Running from the truth and the endless pain
[03:04.00] Electric hearts in a concrete maze
[03:08.00] Living for the night, sleeping through the days
[03:14.00] We're just silhouettes in the midnight rain
[03:18.00] Running from the truth and the endless pain
[03:22.00] Electric hearts in a concrete maze
[03:26.00] Living for the night, sleeping through the days
[03:32.00] Outro
[03:34.00] Silhouettes in the rain
[03:38.00] Silhouettes in the rain
[03:42.00] We're just silhouettes
[03:46.00] Silhouettes in the rain
